sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Heading, Flex, Stack, Box, Text, List, ListItem, ListIcon, Divider, Link, Icon, Avatar, Button } from '@chakra-ui/core'; import Container from '../components/Container'; import Subscribe from '../components/Subscribe'; const VideoCard = ({ title, length, href, children, ...rest }) => ( {title} {length} {children} ); const Index = () => ( RENDY DWI PUTRA CHANNEL{' '} YOUTUBE Temukan keseruan dan ilmu yang tidak akan kalian dapatkan dimana pun, selain di CHANNEL YOUTUBE RENDY DWI PUTRA. SIAPA RENDY DWI PUTRA?? Hai semua!!! perkenalkan saya Rendy dwi putra. Saya anak ke2 dari 3 bersaudara. No wonder ~30% of React developers choose Next.js. SDN 1 MOJOPANGGUNG SMPN 1 GLAGAH SMKN 1 GLAGAH STIKOM PGRI BANYUWANGI (SAAT INI) Hundreds of customers, thousands of views. After teaching hundreds of developers around the world, I've made this course free. Why? Learning Next.js will{' '} transform your career as a front-end developer. With almost five hours of content, this course will kickstart your career as a modern front-end developer. If you're familiar with basic HTML/CSS, JavaScript, and React – you've found the right course. Beginner Friendly Open-Source Code High-Quality Video & Audio Course Overview All videos are 100% free. If you'd like to support me, you can pay-what-you-want on  Gumroad  or check out my new course  React 2025. Learn about the fundamentals of Next.js and how it compares to Gatsby and Create React App. A quick refresher on props and state, classes vs. functional components, and React Hooks. Install Next.js and get it running locally, with thoughts about linting and formatting. Learn how to make client-side transitions between pages and fetch data from URLs. Configure CSS, Sass, or CSS-in-JS, while discussing responsive and mobile-first design. Ditch your custom server for API Routes with Hasura and GraphQL. Handle image compression, optimization, and learn about meta tags and the open-graph schema. Hands-on example building an MDX blog and using StaticKit and Theme UI. Learn about JWTs and pros/cons between Auth0 and Firebase. Build login and sign-up pages. Testing best practices with React Testing Library and handling errors with Sentry. Should I use Redux or React Context? Plus, configuring TypeScript and more. Ship your application with Vercel or Netlify and learn about pre-rendering and serverless functions. Build a static site backed by a Prisma database in this complete tutorial. What people are saying. "Lee is an awesome teacher and I really enjoyed taking this course. It not only touches on the core of Next.js, but also broader concepts like TypeScript, testing and authentication. Videos are great quality and good length. I would definitely recommend to both newcomers to Next.js as well as to people who want to sharpen themselves on the Next.js fundamentals." –– Maurits Misana Mastering Next.js "Not only did I enjoy your Mastering Next.js course, but I learned many things entirely new to me. This course opened my eyes to what's possible and what you can achieve with these technologies." –– José Llamas Mastering Next.js I'm Lee Robinson –– developer, writer, and the creator of Mastering Next.js and React 2025. more about me » ); export default Index;
